adoption_phase.description: Training and change management phase - time-based support model
adoption_phase.note: Duration and hours are specified by user. System creates monthly support tasks automatically based on adoption duration.

standard_tasks.name: Training Material Preparation
standard_tasks.description: Create training guides, videos, and documentation tailored to client's processes
standard_tasks.description_es: Crear guías de capacitación, videos y documentación adaptados a los procesos del cliente

standard_tasks.name: Knowledge Base Setup
standard_tasks.description: Create internal knowledge base with FAQs, tips, and troubleshooting guides
standard_tasks.description_es: Crear base de conocimiento interna con FAQs, consejos y guías de solución de problemas

standard_tasks.name: Admin/Super User Training
standard_tasks.description: Train system administrators and super users on system configuration and maintenance
standard_tasks.description_es: Capacitar a administradores del sistema y super usuarios en configuración y mantenimiento

standard_tasks.name: End User Training Sessions
standard_tasks.name_es: Sesiones de Capacitación para Usuarios Finales
standard_tasks.description: Conduct role-based training sessions for end users by department/module
standard_tasks.description_es: Realizar sesiones de capacitación basadas en roles para usuarios finales por departamento/módulo

standard_tasks.name: Go-Live Preparation
standard_tasks.description: Final system checks, cutover planning, and go-live readiness assessment
standard_tasks.description_es: Verificaciones finales del sistema, planificación de corte y evaluación de preparación para go-live

standard_tasks.name: Go-Live Support (Day 1-3)
standard_tasks.description: Intensive on-site or remote support during first days of live operation
standard_tasks.description_es: Soporte intensivo en sitio o remoto durante los primeros días de operación en vivo

standard_tasks.name: Project Closure & Handover
standard_tasks.description: Final project review, lessons learned, and handover to ongoing support team
standard_tasks.description_es: Revisión final del proyecto, lecciones aprendidas y entrega al equipo de soporte continuo

dynamic_support_tasks.description: These tasks are generated automatically based on adoption duration and total hours

task_template.name: Ongoing Support - Month {month_number}
task_template.description: Provide ongoing support, training, and assistance to users. Hours allocated based on total adoption budget divided by number of months.
task_template.description_es: Proporcionar soporte continuo, capacitación y asistencia a usuarios. Horas asignadas según presupuesto total de adopción dividido por número de meses.

dynamic_support_tasks.calculation: total_adoption_hours minus sum of standard_tasks hours, divided by number of months
